experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
experiences.reasoning: This experience highlights his role and responsibilities at NREL where he was involved in refining data processes and optimizing system performance using various tools and technologies.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from Pre-staging to end-user report generation stage. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records by debugging existing legacy code. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks for filtering source data, reducing execution times by 20%. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments via WinSCP/PuTTY.
experiences.reasoning: The detailed description of his responsibilities and technological involvement at Oracle illustrates his skills in software development and problem-solving in real-world financial applications.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshooted bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
experiences.reasoning: This role involved designing and improving software solutions for hardware interfacing, which is significant for those looking at embedded systems or firmware development.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed a custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with 95% accuracy using linear regression.
experiences.reasoning: This early career experience indicates his initial exposure and problem-solving with Python and data analysis, beneficial for roles in data science or machine learning.

experiences.title: Graduate Services Assistant - Grader
experiences.company: Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University
experiences.description: Grader for CSE 536 Advanced Operating Systems course under School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence. Responsibilities included preparing and reviewing coursework, assisting students during office hours, and grading assignments.
experiences.reasoning: This academic role showcases his commitment to education and ability to handle technical subjects like OS, adding depth to his academic experiences.
